summary: Regulating and licensing special services vehicles conveying certain elderly and handicapped persons for hire, and amending Section 238 of the License Code (Ordinance 48022) and Sections 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 20, 21, 22, 25 & 27 of Ordinance 59866.
committee: Public Safety and Health and Finance
